name: Instrument
instructions: MCP Server - Instrument Model Context Protocol Server Implementation

get_all_instrument_field_names.name: get_all_instrument_field_names
get_all_instrument_field_names.description: Get a list of the fields thare are held by the instrument service for a each instrument

get_instruments.name: get_instruments
get_instruments.description: Get a list of matching instruments by passing a field name and a regex pattern, all instruments with the field that matches the pattern are returned

annotations.title: Get all instruments that have a field that matches the given regex pattern
